FAQ.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.desc: Know in detail about the syllabus of our data structures course, fees and scholarship

FaqDATA.ques: Under the data structures course, what learning options are offered?
FaqDATA.ans: Skillslash offers the Best data structures course with project certification. The fact that we provide offline and online learning options for our data structures course with real-world experience is a focal point. In addition, we provide a blended learning curriculum created especially for professionals. Additionally, as part of our data structures online course, you can take part in live classes that use a hybrid learning approach. Also, you will be doing some practical work at the industrial project site. However, because of the epidemic, we can only provide fully online courses through live sessions. This implies that you can communicate with your instructor in real time, just as you would during a typical face-to-face session. Additionally, at this time, cloud-based services will be used for all practical sessions of our data structures course.

FaqDATA.ques: If I have to skip a lesson because of an emergency, would there be a make-up session?
FaqDATA.ans: First off all, we offer the best Data Structures Course with live online classes. Additionally, recordings of such classes are provided to all of our students. We also give you unrestricted access to these recorded sessions, thus enabling you to refer to them whenever you need theoretical support for your career in  Data Structures Course. So,  you need not feel bad if you miss a live class of our python data structures course. However, you are strongly encouraged to attend all live classes.

FaqDATA.ques: What if I didn't fully comprehend a module? Will I be able to take the data structures course again?
FaqDATA.ans: Most significantly, you can take the training of our best Data Structures Course in python again with a different batch if you did not comprehend a whole module. Hence, there is absolutely no chance that you will continue to be confused about the learning modules.

FaqDATA.ques: What is Skillslash’s data structures course scholarship program?
FaqDATA.ans: Primarily, under the data structures course scholarship program, every candidate will have to take a 20-minute online aptitude exam. If a candidate passes the aptitude exam with a score of more than 65 percent, he or she will be eligible for a 10 percent discount on the course fees. Besides, candidates who lost their jobs as a result of the COVID situation, as well as mothers who want to begin their careers, can receive up to a 100% scholarship based on their exam score. Thus, opening the doors to sign up for the best data structures course.

FaqDATA.ques: What kind of certification does this best Data Structures Course provide?
FaqDATA.ans: The important aspect is that, by enrolling in Skillslash’s best data structures course, you will receive practical training experience. In addition to that, you can avail shareable, globally acknowledged project certifications directly from top startups. Which means you get certifications from the companies with which you are associated with for live projects.
